title: Who should win the 2006 canadian election? (fixed)
content:
Who should win the 2006 canadian election?

Note: I started a new poll cos i mucked up the old one, so please delete the old one [url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm5.showMessage?topicID=491.topic]here[/url] [quote]Quote:[hr]Woe to you Oh Earth and Sea
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
because he knows the time is short
Let him who hath understanding
reckon the number of the beast
for it is a human number
its number is six hundred and sixty six.[hr][/quote]

title: Re: Who should win the 2006 canadian election? (fixed)
content:
Lets get this straight;

You [An Aussie] are askng us [Almost none of whom is canadian] who should govern Canada?

Firstly, we have no right at all to say; the canadian people will elect the government they feel best reflects their outlok.

Secondly, how are we supposed to grasp the issues of another country; its like asking us who should govern Libya. [And as America has learned time and time again, the government *you* want in another country is often the very worst one possible]

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
